title: Who was Juana Inès de la Cruz? - Quora

response.answer_text: She was a Mexican writer, philosopher, composer and poet and nun. She died in 1695 after contributing much to Spanish literature. She wrote poetry, dramas and comedies. She was also interested in music. She was quite outspoken as a woman of her time and she criticized misogyny and the hypocrisy of men. She was even condemned by the Bishop of Puebla. Juana Ines de la Cruz died of the plague at the age of 46 in Mexico City.
Sor juna ineas deal cruz OSH was a Mexican writer,phillospher,poet of the borquae period and hieronymatie nun of new Spain.
